channel.title: Repawn location, can it be changed?
channel.description: can the automatic respawn position (like after u die) be changed from the varrock east bank to somewhere like edgeville? or just anywhere?

item.title: Repawn location, can it be changed?
item.dc:creator: @PaulT PaulT
item.description:
@PaulT wrote:

[quote=“Calvin, post:8, topic:771”]I think he means Priv. servers.

Look for the co ords of the Varrock East Bank, and change that in Client.java.[/quote]

I would assume if he meant that, he would have posted it in the server section?!?

Read full topic
item.source: Repawn location, can it be changed?

item.title: Repawn location, can it be changed?

@Calvin wrote:

I think he means Priv. servers.

Look for the co ords of the Varrock East Bank, and change that in Client.java.

item.source: Repawn location, can it be changed?

item.title: Repawn location, can it be changed?
item.dc:creator: @xerozcheez xerozcheez
item.description:
@xerozcheez wrote:

[quote=“PaulT, post:6, topic:771”]Ok, here’s how I would try:
1)Find where the client kills you…“Oh dear you have died”, look for the method. If you can’t find it in any of the client files, dump the data files and search them with a hex editor…
2)Do the quest where you can change where you respawn, and monitor the methods you found, see how they change when you change your spawn point (switch it back and forth) see which one is being called/changed. It may take alot of searching, it may be impossible.

Good luck.[/quote]

Exactly what paul said, to help you download a server source and see what packets are making you teleport.

Read full topic
item.source: Repawn location, can it be changed?

item.title: Repawn location, can it be changed?
item.dc:creator: @PaulT PaulT
item.description:
@PaulT wrote:

Ok, here’s how I would try:
1)Find where the client kills you…“Oh dear you have died”, look for the method. If you can’t find it in any of the client files, dump the data files and search them with a hex editor…
2)Do the quest where you can change where you respawn, and monitor the methods you found, see how they change when you change your spawn point (switch it back and forth) see which one is being called/changed. It may take alot of searching, it may be impossible.

Good luck.

Read full topic

item.title: Repawn location, can it be changed?
item.dc:creator: @l3etal3lade l3etal3lade
item.description:
@l3etal3lade wrote:

Yes it can be changed… and I’ll tell you how for free…because I’'m nice…

Step 1: Make a member account…
Step 2: Level up a bit…
Step 3: Do the quest that lets you choose between fally and lumbridge as your “after-death start location”.

Read full topic

item.title: Repawn location, can it be changed?
item.dc:creator: @White_Castle White Castle
item.description:
@White_Castle wrote:

If you’re talking about client hacking, then no. It’s completely server side. We still have yet to find anything that changes stuff server side.
